com.communote.server.persistence.user.client

Class ClientStatisticDaoBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • com.communote.server.persistence.user.client.ClientStatisticDaoBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientStatisticDao, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientStatisticDaoImpl

    public abstract class ClientStatisticDaoBase
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
implements ClientStatisticDao

    Base Spring DAO Class: is able to create, update, remove, load, and find objects of type com.communote.server.persistence.user.client.ClientStatistic.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    ClientStatistic

      • create

        public Object create(int transform,
                     ClientStatistic clientStatistic)
        Description copied from interface: ClientStatisticDao

        Does the same thing as ClientStatisticDao.create(com.communote.server.model.client.ClientStatistic) with an additional flag called transform. If this flag is set to TRANSFORM_NONE then the returned entity will NOT be transformed. If this flag is any of the other constants defined here then the result WILL BE passed through an operation which can optionally transform the entity (into a value object for example). By default, transformation does not occur.

        Specified by:
        create in interface ClientStatisticDao
        See Also:
        com.communote.server.persistence.user.client.ClientStatisticDao#create(int transform, com.communote.server.persistence.user.client.ClientStatistic)

        public Collection<ClientStatistic> create(int transform,
                                          Collection<ClientStatistic> entities)
        Description copied from interface: ClientStatisticDao

        Does the same thing as ClientStatisticDao.create(com.communote.server.model.client.ClientStatistic) with an additional flag called transform. If this flag is set to TRANSFORM_NONE then the returned entity will NOT be transformed. If this flag is any of the other constants defined here then the result WILL BE passed through an operation which can optionally transform the entities (into value objects for example). By default, transformation does not occur.

        Specified by:

        See Also:

      • load

        public Object load(int transform,
                   Long id)
        Description copied from interface: ClientStatisticDao

        Does the same thing as ClientStatisticDao.load(Long) with an additional flag called transform. If this flag is set to TRANSFORM_NONE then the returned entity will NOT be transformed. If this flag is any of the other constants defined in this class then the result WILL BE passed through an operation which can optionally transform the entity (into a value object for example). By default, transformation does not occur.

        Specified by:
        load in interface ClientStatisticDao
        id - the identifier of the entity to load.
        Returns:
        either the entity or the object transformed from the entity.
        See Also:
        ClientStatisticDao.load(int, Long)

      • loadAll

        public Collection<?> loadAll(int transform)
        Description copied from interface: ClientStatisticDao

        Does the same thing as ClientStatisticDao.loadAll() with an additional flag called transform. If this flag is set to TRANSFORM_NONE then the returned entity will NOT be transformed. If this flag is any of the other constants defined here then the result WILL BE passed through an operation which can optionally transform the entity (into a value object for example). By default, transformation does not occur.

        Specified by:
        loadAll in interface ClientStatisticDao
        Parameters:
        transform - the flag indicating what transformation to use.
        Returns:
        the loaded entities.
        See Also:
        ClientStatisticDao.loadAll(int)

      • transformEntities

        protected void transformEntities(int transform,
                                 Collection<?> entities)
        Transforms a collection of entities using the transformEntity(int,com.communote.server.model.client.ClientStatistic) method. This method does not instantiate a new collection.

        This method is to be used internally only.

        Parameters:
        transform - one of the constants declared in com.communote.server.persistence.user.client.ClientStatisticDao
        entities - the collection of entities to transform
        See Also:
        transformEntity(int,com.communote.server.model.client.ClientStatistic)

      • transformEntity

        protected Object transformEntity(int transform,
                                 ClientStatistic entity)
        Allows transformation of entities into value objects (or something else for that matter), when the transform flag is set to one of the constants defined in com.communote.server.persistence.user.client.ClientStatisticDao, please note that the ClientStatisticDao.TRANSFORM_NONE constant denotes no transformation, so the entity itself will be returned. If the integer argument value is unknown ClientStatisticDao.TRANSFORM_NONE is assumed.
        Parameters:
        transform - one of the constants declared in ClientStatisticDao
        entity - an entity that was found
        Returns:
        the transformed entity (i.e. new value object, etc)
        See Also:
        transformEntities(int,java.util.Collection)
